findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...4. TERM AND TERMINATION Either party may terminate for convenience with 30 days written notice....
findings.context:
no ownership interest.

3. PAYMENT TERMS
Licensee shall pay monthly license fees of $5,000, due on the first of each month. Late payments incur a 2% monthly fee.

4. TERM AND TERMINATION
Either party may terminate for convenience with 30 days written notice.

5. INDEMNIFICATION
Licensee agrees to indemnify Licensor for claims arising from Licensee's breach of this Agreement, up to a maximum of $500,000.

findings.title: Late fees / high interest
findings.rationale: Penalty terms can increase costs if payment timing slips.
